text.name: Class Master's Costume M
text.desc: A long cape with a hood. The coat of arms decorating the thick fabric and the generous embroidery create a sense of dignity. Wearing this cape might put you in a calm mood.

text.name: Veteran Researcher's Costume M
text.desc: This costume was developed for the dangerous work of Imagine research. It features durable fabric and sturdy stitching, and can withstand wear during adventures. It also has functionality, such as pockets and gloves.

text.name: Asterliese Wealthy Man's Costume M
text.desc: In addition to its graceful silhouette, the generous amount of fabric around the cuffs and collar gives the outfit an elegant impression. It is an outfit that stands out not only on adventures but also in social situations and other public occasions.

text.name: Garrison Gatekeeper Costume M
text.desc: The outfit exudes the simplicity and sturdiness of a behind-the-scenes hero. It is reliable, but the design has exquisite lines that do not make the opponent feel oppressed.

text.name: Salamzahd Gatekeeper Costume M

text.name: Traveling performer's costume M
text.desc: The costumes of a traveling troupe of entertainers are modest yet elegant. They were designed by the troupe's costumer and sewn individually, so they can withstand vigorous movement.

text.name: Traveling Performer Troupe Leader Costume M

text.name: Farmer's Costume M

text.name: Salamzahd Noble Son's Costume M
text.desc: The costumes were designed for the economically well-off young generation. They are masterpieces that can be called works of art, with an awareness of elegance and cuteness. The feet are designed to withstand vigorous movement.

text.name: Craftsman's Costume M
text.desc: This outfit is suitable for all kinds of movements, whether it be fine work or heavy lifting. The shape of the shoulders of the tops has been carefully sewn so as not to restrict arm movement.

text.name: Asterliese Asset Management Officer Costume F
text.desc: This is the outfit you can see at the Asterliese asset management counter. It's simple and functional, like workwear. It's made with thick fabrics for durability, but it's also breathable.

text.name: Salamzahd Asset Management Officer Outfit F
text.desc: The costumes can be seen at the Salamzahd asset management office. They are designed to be easy to work in, but the details are reminiscent of a desert town. The fabric is of high quality and extremely comfortable to wear.

text.name: Staff Groovy Costume F
text.desc: A certain employee's outfit is incredibly cool. It combines basic parts, but the whole outfit is pop and cute. The ribbons on the wrists and ankles are eye-catching accents.

text.name: Memory Stand Staff Costume F
text.desc: The uniform worn by staff who handle Liquid Memory. The side buttons on the top are impressive, and the apron, which looks like a high-waisted skirt, is highly functional. It's cute, but also gives off a sense of intellectual cleanliness.

text.name: Peasant Woman Costume F
